## R

```{r}
#| echo: true
library(sf)
sf::write_sf(spData::world, "world.gpkg")
plot(spData::world)
```

## Python

```{python}
#| echo: true
import geopandas as gpd
world = gpd.read_file('world.gpkg')
world.plot()
```

## Julia

```{julia}
#| echo: true
using GeoDataFrames
world = GeoDataFrames.read("world.gpkg")
```
```{julia}
using CairoMakie, GeoMakie
f, a, p = poly(world.geometry)
poly(f[1, 2], world.geometry; color = world.pop, axis = (; type = GeoAxis,))
f
```
